verbose_text: In addition, functional analysis demonstrated that the overexpression of KLF4 led to an increase in the expression of E-cadherin and zonula occludens-l (ZO-1), and a decrease in the expression of alpha-SMA and fibroblast specific protein 1 (FSP-1), thus reversing the effects of the suppression of KLF4.
evidence: E-cadherin and zonula occludens-l (ZO-1), and a decrease in the expression of alpha-SMA and fibroblast-specific protein 1 (FSP-1), thus reversing the effects of the suppression of KLF4
